field.name: MODER0
field.description: Port D configuration bits These bits are written by software to configure the I/O direction mode. 00: Input (reset state) 01: General purpose output mode 10: Alternate function mode 11: Analog mode

field.name: OT0
field.description: Port D output type configuration bits These bits are written by software to configure the output type of the I/O port. 0: Output push-pull (reset state) 1: Output open-drain
